verbs.description: runaway train dramatically derails after 57 miles [ARG1: the driver of a freight train in western australia] [V: got] [ARG2: out] [ARGM-PRP: to inspect an issue with one of its 268 wagons early monday] — and it kept going without him the train loaded with iron ore hurtled across 57 miles of the remote pilbara region before it was deliberately derailed from bhp billiton australia guardian india newman guardian band port hedland western australia pilbara port hedland
